summary: Build a forex trading app where users (including the owner) can trade, with deposit/withdrawal, bonuses, M-Pesa payments, and a monetization model where the app owner earns from users' trading activity.
architectural_notes: No guarantee of 100% profit/zero losses; trading involves risk and must include clear risk disclosures and regulatory compliance considerations.
Add configurable owner deposit payment details (e.g., M-Pesa phone number) shown in manual deposit instructions and used for admin verification of deposit references.
known_issues: User requirement requests impossible performance guarantee (100% profit, zero losses); needs scope adjustment to realistic trading/risk model.

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity sign-in and persist a user profile that includes role (admin or user), display name, and wallet balance.
Create a simulated forex trading engine that allows users to open/close trades on selectable forex pairs with clear risk disclosure (no guaranteed profit).
Add a wallet ledger with deposit and withdrawal requests, including statuses (Pending/Approved/Rejected) and an admin approval workflow.
Support an M-Pesa payment method as a manual flow: show M-Pesa instructions, capture transaction reference fields, and route requests through admin review (no direct M-Pesa API integration).
Implement a bonus system that can grant promotional credits (e.g., deposit bonus) with admin-configurable rules and clear visibility to users.
Add an owner monetization model where the app charges trading fees (e.g., per-trade commission or spread) and records platform revenue separately from user balances.
Build an admin dashboard for managing users, reviewing transactions, setting simulated market prices (if applicable), and monitoring trading activity.
Create a coherent, extraordinary visual theme (not blue/purple) and apply it consistently across landing, trading, wallet, and admin pages using Tailwind + shadcn components.

Update the wallet deposit M-Pesa instructions UI to display the configured destination number "0701599601" (from the backend query) in clear English, while keeping the flow manual (no M-Pesa API integration).

new_feature_requests.summary: Forex trading app with in-app trading functionality for all users (including admin/owner account)
Wallet and payments: deposits and withdrawals
Monetization: app owner earns revenue from users trading (fees/commission/spread model)
Persist an owner-configurable M-Pesa payment destination number in the backend and expose a query for the frontend to read it.

projectName: Forex Trading App MVP (Simulated Trading) with Wallet, Bonuses, Admin Fees, and M-Pesa Manual Deposit/Withdrawal
